participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.background: My first purchase was a Game of Thrones book, which I hid in my room so my parents wouldn't find it. I'm taking advantage of my newfound freedom to travel and see the world. My appreciation of nature is a key part of my personality. I live a very active life, but I always make time for my family. My black lab is my best friend.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic, creative, and dedicated to family.
participant_2.background: I'm excited to drive my new car in any weather! I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs. I'm a writer who enjoys spending time with my dog. I love playing guitar but sometimes I spend too much time practicing and not enough time with my family. I run every morning before work to clear my head and relieve stress.

content.text: Good! I just moved to a new city and I'm trying to meet new people.
Oh cool! I'm always looking for new friends too. What are your interests?
I love to read, travel, and spend time in nature.
Those are all great interests! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Game of Thrones series and I'm also a big fan of Stephen King.
I've read a few of the Game of Thrones books, but I haven't read any Stephen King.
You should! They're really good. What kind of music do you like?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm especially into classic rock.
That's cool! I like classic rock too. What's your favorite band?
Me too! They're my favorite band too.
That's awesome! We should totally hang out sometime. We could go to a concert or something.
That sounds like fun! I'm free this weekend if you want to do something.
That works for me! I'll text you my number.
